short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Sets wallpaper background to useful device info.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Replace your background with detailed information about your Chrome OS device including CP, memory usage, disk usage, temperature, last login time and more.
